title: OnePlus 12
content:
{{Short description|Android smartphone}} {{Infobox mobile phone | name = OnePlus 12 | codename = | logo = | logosize = | image = | imagesize = | alt = | caption = | brand = [[OnePlus]] | manufacturer = | slogan = | colors = {{plainlist| * Flowy Emerald * Silky Black }} | series = | modelnumber = {{Ubl | '''PJD110:''' [[China]] | '''CPH2573:''' [[India]] | '''CPH2581:''' [[EU]] | '''CPH2583:''' [[North America]] }} {{cite web |url= https://thedroidwin.com/oneplus-12-pjd110-cph2573-cph2581-cph2583/|title= OnePlus 12: PJD110 CPH2573 CPH2581 CPH2583|last= |first= |date= |website= thedroidwin|publisher= |access-date= 1 November 2024 |quote=}} | networks = [[2G]], [[3G]], [[4G]], [[4G LTE]], [[5G NR]] | released = {{Start date and age|2023|12|11}} | available = | unitssold = | unitsshipped = | predecessor = [[OnePlus 11]] | successor = [[OnePlus 13]] | related = | type = | form = [[Slate phone|Slate]] | size = {{ubl|H: {{convert|164.3|mm|in|abbr=on}}
W: {{convert|75.8|mm|in|abbr=on}}
D: {{convert|9.2|mm|in|abbr=on}} {{cite web |url=https://www.gsmarena.com/oneplus_12-12725.php |title=OnePlus 12 - Full phone specifications |access-date=October 31, 2024}} }} | weight = {{ubl |{{convert|220|g|oz|abbr=on}}}} | os = Android 14, upgradable to Android 15 | soc = [[Qualcomm Snapdragon]] 8 Gen 3 | cpu = Octa cores:
{{bulleted list|1x Cortex-X4 (3.3{{nbsp}}GHz) |3x Cortex-A720 (3.2{{nbsp}}GHz) |2x Cortex-A720 (3.0{{nbsp}}GHz) |3x Cortex-A520 (2.3{{nbsp}}GHz)}} | gpu = [[Adreno]] 750 | modem = [[List of Qualcomm Snapdragon modems|Qualcomm X75 5G]] | memory = '''256GB:''' 12GB RAM
'''512GB:''' 16GB RAM | storage = {{ Ubl| '''UFS 4.0:''' 256GB, 512GB}} | memory_card = | sim = | battery = Li-Po 5400 mAh
(Dual-cell 2,700 mAh, non-removable) | charging = {{Ubl|'''International:''' 100W wired, PD, 100% in 26 min, 50W AirVOOC |'''USA:''' 80W wired, PD, 100% in 30 min}} | input = | display = {{Ubl| '''Type:''' LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 600 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 4500 nits (peak) | '''Size:''' {{ convert|6.82|in|mm|abbr=on }}
~90.8% screen-to-body ratio |'''Resolution:''' 1440 x 3168 pixels |'''Protection:''' Corning [[Gorilla Glass]] Victus 2}} | rear_camera = '''Triple cameras:'''
{{bulleted list|50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.43", 1.12μm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS |64 MP, f/2.6, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.7μm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom |48 MP, f/2.2, 14mm, 114˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.0", 0.8μm, PDAF }} | front_camera = 32 MP, f/2.4, 21mm (wide), 1/2.74", 0.8μm | sound = | connectivity = [[Bluetooth]] 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, LHDC NFC GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC WiFi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct | water_resist = IP65 | other = | sar = | hac = | website = https://www.oneplus.com/us/12 | references = }} The '''OnePlus 12''' is an [[Android (operating system)|Android-based]] [[smartphone]] manufactured by [[OnePlus]]. It was announced on December 5, 2023, and it was available on December 11, 2023. OnePlus 12 uses aluminum frame and has a curved from sides display. The rear part of the phone uses [[etched glass]] that feels like [[sandpaper]]. With [[IP65]] rating the phone is not protected against submersion or strong water jets, however it is enough to protect against splashes of water and usual water jets. The phone has achieved more than doubling performance result in 3DMark's Wildlife extreme test in comparison with [[Pixel 8 Pro]].{{cite web |url= https://www.ign.com/articles/oneplus-12-review|title= OnePlus 12 Review|last= |first= |date= |website= IGN|publisher= |access-date= 2 November 2024 |quote=}} == Software & support == OnePlus 12 ships with [[Oxygen OS]] 14 ([[Android 14]]). OnePlus claims to provide 4 years of Android updates and 5 years of security patches.{{cite web |url= https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2024/feb/23/oneplus-12-review-smartphone-left-behind-by-top-rivals-screen-battery-life|title= OnePlus 12 review: smartphone left behind by top rivals|last= |first= |date= |website= The Guardian|publisher= |access-date= 31 October 2024 |quote=}} Since October 30th 2024 some owners of OnePlus 12 can optionally receive beta version of Oxygen OS 15 ([[Android 15]]) before the final release. Oxygen OS 15 includes many new features, among those are updated UI interface, theft protection, easier to share files with iPhone, better multitasking and drag-and-drop to other apps. {{cite web |url= https://techpp.com/2024/10/25/oxygenos-15-features-rollout/|title= OxygenOS 15: New Features, Supported Devices, and Rollout Timeline|last= |first= |date= |website= techpp|publisher= |access-date= 1 November 2024 |quote=}} Oxygen OS 15 ([[Android 15]]) is also expected to bring new AI features:{{cite web |url= https://www.oneplus.com/global/oxygenos15|title= OxygenOS 15|last= |first= |date= |website= OnePlus|publisher= |access-date= 1 November 2024 |quote=}} * AI Detail Boost allows quality improvements pixelated photos after cropping * AI Unblur * AI Reflection Eraser - glare/reflection removal * AI Notes to get summaries, filler-free voice transcripts, tone adjustment (formal/casual) [[Android 15]] (Oxygen OS 15) stable version started to roll out globally since November 11th 2024.{{cite web |url= https://www.notebookcheck.net/Android-15-based-OxygenOS-15-stable-update-rolls-out-to-the-OnePlus-12-globally.914533.0.html|title= Android 15-based OxygenOS 15 stable update rolls out to the OnePlus 12 globally|last= |first= |date= |website= notebookcheck.net|publisher= |access-date= 14 November 2024 |quote=}} On November 28th 2024 OnePlus started shipping OxygenOS 15.0.0.305 which brings AI features which were not included in the original Android 15 update earlier this month.{{cite web |url= https://community.oneplus.com/thread/1738602115003056133|title= OxygenOS 15.0.0.305 for the OnePlus 12|last= |first= |date= |website= community.oneplus.com|publisher= |access-date= 2 December 2024 |quote=}} == Other features == OnePlus 12 has an [[Consumer_IR|IR]] for controlling remotely consumer devices such as TVs. {{cite web |url= https://www.tomsguide.com/features/forget-galaxy-s24-this-underrated-oneplus-12-feature-beats-samsung|title= Forget Galaxy S24 — this underrated OnePlus 12 feature beats Samsung|last= |first= |date= |website= tomsguide|publisher= |access-date= 1 November 2024 |quote=}} == Hardware == === Storage === OnePlus also offers a 24 GB / 1 TB variant, but it is not available in all regions. === Battery === According to GSM Arena OnePlus 12 has a better battery life than the previous model [[OnePlus 11]] (5,000mAh capacity in OnePlus 11), OnePlus 12 works ~27% longer from a full battery in comparison with OnePlus 11 according to tests.{{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/oneplus_12-review-2659p3.php|title= OnePlus 12 review: Lab tests - display, battery life, charging speed, speaker|last= |first= |date= |website= gsmarena|publisher= |access-date= 1 November 2024 |quote=}} According to notebookcheck review, OnePlus 12 has a better battery runtime than OnePlus 11 in all 3 tests: 1965 minutes vs 1680 minutes in Reader/Idle test, 1820 minutes vs 1380 minutes in H.264 video playback test, 1237 minutes vs 803 minutes in WiFi websurfing test. OnePlus 12 and [[Samsung S24 Ultra]] have achieved similar active use score according to tests. However, in terms of charging speed OnePlus 12 uses 100W charger and the battery can be charged to 100% in 24 minutes, meanwhile Samsung S24 Ultra uses 45W charger and it needs 65 minutes to charge battery to 100%.{{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/oneplus_12_vs_samsung_galaxy_s24_ultra_review_battery_camera_price_compared-news-62025.php|title= OnePlus 12 vs. Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra|last= |first= |date= |website= gsmarena|publisher= |access-date= 2 November 2024 |quote=}} === Camera system === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+Sensors{{cite web |url= https://www.oneplus.com/us/12/specs|title= OnePlus 12 Specs|last= |first= |date= |website= OnePlus|publisher= |access-date= 31 October 2024 |quote=}} ! colspan="1" | Wide |Sony LYT-808 |- !Telephoto |OmniVision OV64B |- !Ultrawide | colspan="1" | Sony IMX581 |- !Front | colspan="1" | Sony IMX615 |} == Price == Launch price is $799.99 / £849 (around AU$1,215).{{cite web |url=https://www.techradar.com/phones/android/oneplus-12-review |title=OnePlus 12 review: the coolest phone you can buy, if you dare |access-date=October 31, 2024}} == Reception == According to notebookcheck OnePlus 12 is on par with other Android flagships in 2024.{{cite web |url=https://www.notebookcheck.net/OnePlus-12-5G-Smartphone-Review-Near-Galaxy-S24-Ultra-flagship-experience-for-half-the-price.849177.0.html |title=OnePlus 12 5G Smartphone Review: Near-Galaxy S24 Ultra flagship experience for half the price |access-date=October 31, 2024}} CNN praised $800 phone as capable of competing with flagships.{{cite web |url=https://edition.cnn.com/cnn-underscored/reviews/oneplus-12 |title=The $800 OnePlus 12 gives Samsung and Google phones a run for their money |access-date=October 31, 2024}} == References == {{reflist}} == External links == * {{Official website|https://www.oneplus.com/us/12}} {{S-start}} {{Succession box | title = OnePlus 12 | years = 2023 | before = [[OnePlus 11]] | after = [[OnePlus 13]] }} {{S-end}} {{OnePlus|state=collapsed}} [[Category:OnePlus mobile phones]] [[Category:Android (operating system) devices]] [[Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2023]]
